formBuilder.name: Drag-and-Drop Data Collection
formBuilder.desc: Quickly build forms to collect structured data from multiple channels with open public collection support.

dataWriting.name: Data-Integrated Writing

aiSentiment.name: AI Market Sentiment
aiSentiment.desc: Real-time analysis of market trends and news using advanced LLMs.

smartStrategy.name: Smart "Make T" Strategy
smartStrategy.desc: Automated monitoring and alerts for high-frequency trading opportunities.

multiMarket.name: Multi-Market Monitoring
multiMarket.desc: Support for A-shares, Hong Kong, and US markets in one view.

cloudSync.name: Cloud Sync & Notifications
cloudSync.desc: Sync your watchlist across devices and get sound/desktop alerts.

hero.title: Smart Data Writing Platform
hero.subtitle: All-in-one Tool for Data Collection, Analysis, and Writing
hero.description: From drag-and-drop forms to AI-powered analysis, and data-driven automated writing. Bridge the gap between data and documents.

features.title: End-to-End Data & Content Workflow
features.subtitle: Intelligent automation from collection to production

formBuilder.name: Drag-and-Drop Form Builder
formBuilder.desc: WYSIWYG form builder. Easily create questionnaires, registration forms, or internal data collection sheets with multi-channel support.

aiViews.name: AI-Powered Analysis
aiViews.desc: Built-in powerful AI analysis engine. Automatically convert collected data into visual charts, pivot tables, and generate deep insights.

dataWriting.name: Data-Driven Writing
dataWriting.desc: Directly reference real-time data and charts in your documents. When data updates, documents sync automatically.

permissions.name: Enterprise Permission Control
permissions.desc: Role-Based Access Control (RBAC). Manage access not just for documents, but down to specific form fields and data rows.

cta.title: Ready to Experience Smart Writing?
cta.description: Join thousands of enterprises pursuing efficiency and start a new era of data-driven content creation.

hero.title: Capture Every Trading Signal Precisely
hero.description: Stock Monitor provides comprehensive real-time market monitoring for A-shares, Hong Kong stocks, and US stocks. With smart T-making strategies and instant notifications, free yourself from busy work and never miss important market movements.

realtime.name: Real-time Quotes
realtime.desc: Auto-refresh every 2 seconds with millisecond-level latency, ensuring you stay ahead.

smartT.name: Smart T-Making
smartT.desc: Built-in strategy threshold configuration, automatically calculate buy/sell points to assist strategy execution.

notifications.name: Comprehensive Alerts
notifications.desc: Support sound alerts, desktop notifications, and logging to ensure you receive notifications even when running in background.

multiMarket.name: Multi-Market Support
multiMarket.desc: Seamlessly cover A-shares, Hong Kong stocks, and US stocks - manage global assets with one tool.

privacy.name: Privacy & Security
privacy.desc: Local storage, no upload of sensitive trading data, transparent code, stable operation.

professionalUI.name: Professional UI
professionalUI.desc: Native experience built with PySide6, supports system tray operation without taking up desktop space.

showcase.title: Feature Showcase
showcase.multiStock: Multi-stock monitoring: List-style management with clear price changes and quotes.
showcase.strategyConfig: Strategy configuration: Customize monitoring rules for each stock (breakout, rebound, price range).
showcase.positionManagement: Position management: Record holding costs and automatically calculate floating P&L.
showcase.systemTray: System tray: Elegantly hidden, quietly monitors in background with bubble notifications.

download.title: Start Your Smart Trading Journey Now
download.subtitle: Free download, local operation, safe and stable
